content: bruce the goose is a cuddle-sized crochet goose that is soft and snuggly this easy crochet pattern is made with faux fur yarn and includes links to video tutorials that contain tips and tricks for working with fur yarn as well as some other techniques used in the pattern > > printable ad-free pdf versions of the > pattern are available in my ravelry > shop or here https //tidd ly/3k5iwos in my etsy shop > **skill level ** easy **terminology ** u s terminology **finished size ** approx 18 5 long from tip of beak to tail after assembly **follow me on social media to see behind-the-scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways ** **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb **pinterest ** www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg **blog ** www theloopylamb com **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com
